name: goodlinks
title: GoodLinks
description: Save, list, and open articles in GoodLinks
author: nicolas-marien

commands.name: save-link
commands.title: Save Link
commands.subtitle: GoodLinks
commands.description: Get a link from your clipboard and save it to GoodLinks.

commands.name: list-unread
commands.title: List Unread Links
commands.subtitle: GoodLinks
commands.description: List the unread links of your GoodLinks database.

commands.name: random-link
commands.title: Random Link
commands.subtitle: GoodLinks
commands.description: Open a random link from GoodLinks.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
